listingCriteria.name: ListedForSale
listingCriteria.description: Whether the property is currently listed for sale with an 'Active' status

listingCriteria.name: ListingStatus
listingCriteria.description: The current status of the most recent listing on the property

listingCriteria.name: ListingType
listingCriteria.description: The type of listing (Market, REO, Shortsale, QuickSale, Distressed, etc.)

listingCriteria.name: ListingDate
listingCriteria.description: The date the property was listed for sale

listingCriteria.name: ListingExpirationDate
listingCriteria.description: The date the listing is set to expire

listingCriteria.name: ListingPrice
listingCriteria.description: The price at which the property is listed for sale

listingCriteria.name: ListPricePerSqFt
listingCriteria.description: The listing price divided by the property's square footage

listingCriteria.name: DaysOnMarket
listingCriteria.description: The number of days the property has been listed for sale

listingCriteria.name: ListingAgent
listingCriteria.description: The name of the real estate agent who has the listing

listingCriteria.name: ListingAgencyName
listingCriteria.description: The name of the real estate agency handling the listing

listingCriteria.name: ListingChangeDate
listingCriteria.description: The date of the last change to the listing (price, status, etc.)

listingCriteria.name: MLSNumber
listingCriteria.description: The Multiple Listing Service identification number for the listing

listingCriteria.name: PriceReduction
listingCriteria.description: Whether the listing price has been reduced

listingCriteria.name: PriceReductionAmount
listingCriteria.description: The dollar amount by which the listing price has been reduced

listingCriteria.name: PriceReductionPercent
listingCriteria.description: The percentage by which the listing price has been reduced

listingCriteria.name: OriginalListPrice
listingCriteria.description: The original price at which the property was listed

listingCriteria.name: ListingToEstimatedValueRatio
listingCriteria.description: The ratio of listing price to estimated property value

criteriaTypes.Multiple Values: Accepts an array of multiple values for matching
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range: Accepts a series of arrays with min and max values, e.g. [[100, 200], [300, 400]]
criteriaTypes.Relative Date: Accepts preset date strings like 'Last 30 Days' or specific dates and ranges
